name: Got It
description:
In 2015, Got It introduced a safe and secure B2B focused loyalty, gifting and rewards platform. Over the past five years Got It has continued to grow and lead the digital voucher business in Vietnam with over 20,000,000 vouchers sold. Got It offers clients a portfolio of trustworthy gifting & rewarding solutions.

With over 140 brands in more than 10,000 locations nationwide, choice is never a problem. Got It?s superior merchant partnerships will ensure our voucher is always accepted, we?re never out of stock.
